intro: Sharpen your beast! Primitive Life 3D Action
description:
The “Weird Game of the Century,” released in 1996 and a major talking point due to its impactful content, is being remastered for Nintendo Switch!

“Tail of the Sun” is a simple 3D action game where you control a caveman as a guardian spirit, living a life in the wild.

Your goal is to stack ivory obtained by hunting the formidable mammoth to build a tower reaching the sun.
To overcome larger prey, explore the open-world field and strengthen your body by eating the meat of hunted beasts and nuts.
What evolution will occur when the ivory tower reaches the sun?
See it with your own eyes.

【A Bizarre Worldview Representing Primitive Resilience】
The defining feature of this title is undoubtedly its unique presentation of primitive life.
Primitive people who slide anywhere and fall asleep,
avant-garde techno music playing during gameplay,
nuts that somehow resemble Japanese sweets, objects that look like body parts...
Enjoy these strange experiences scattered across the vast field.

*This product is a port of a game originally released in 1996 for Nintendo Switch™.
*This game is only available in Japanese.
